short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switch to the classic Reddit interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Miss the old Reddit look and feel? This lightweight extension automatically redirects you to old Reddit interface, even if you're not logged in.

Key features:
- Instant redirection to old Reddit design
- Works whether you're logged in or not
- Free forever: no signup, no payments, no bullsh*t
- 100% secure - no data ever leaves your browser, everything is done locally
